headers.value: default-src 'self'; frame-src 'self' https://www.google.com https://www.google.fr https://maps.google.com https://maps.googleapis.com; child-src 'self' https://www.google.com https://www.google.fr https://maps.google.com https://maps.googleapis.com; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://maps.googleapis.com https://maps.gstatic.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com;
